PHRASE.LANG: Modern science has allowed our engineers to craft a bed that's both comfortable and proven to provide the perfect spinal support.[#Legal]
Nos ingénieurs ont conçu un lit confortable qui soutient parfaitement la colonne vertébrale.[#Legal]
Dank der modernen Wissenschaft konnten unsere Ingenieure ein Bett entwickeln, dass bequem ist und zusätzlich die Wirbelsäule unterstützt. [#Legal]
Grazie alle nuove scoperte della scienza, i nostri artigiani sono riusciti a creare un letto allo stesso tempo comodo e ortopedicamente ineccepibile.[#Legal]
Gracias a la ciencia moderna, nuestros ingenieros han creado una cama tan confortable como saludable para la columna.[#Legal]
Modern science has allowed our engineers to craft a bed that's both comfortable and proven to provide the perfect spinal support.[#Legal]
현대의 과학 덕분에, 이제 우리는 척추를 완벽하게 보호하면서도 편안한 침대를 사용할 수 있습니다. [#Legal]
Modern science has allowed our engineers to craft a bed that's both comfortable and proven to provide the perfect spinal support.[#Legal]
多虧現代科學，我們的工程師成功開發既舒適，而且能為脊柱提供最好支持的床。[#Legal]
多虧現代科學，我們的工程師成功開發既舒適，而且能為脊柱提供最好支持的床。[#Legal]
Modern science has allowed our engineers to craft a bed that's both comfortable and proven to provide the perfect spinal support.[#Legal]
